author: leonardoalt
content: What do EL client devs think about 6780? The current proposal feels quite hacky, is that really the final spec?

author: smartprogrammer
content:
Nethermind already implemented it here:
https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/4704
My personal opinion is that it is not hacky. It is a very viable solution to a problem that is tough to solve otherwise.

author: leonardoalt
content: Thanks! There are other proposals, so agree it's a tough problem but that's not the only possible solution.

author: timbeiko
content: FWIW, we had discussed the other proposals on the last ACDE (I think?) and it seemed like this one was favored by client teams. that said, we are waiting for a full impact analysis of 6780, and agreed yesterday to re-evaluate once that is out + make spec changes if necessary
